Read in company financial data processed from eikon exports and AR master data that contain information on multiple credit risk inputs

Source: R/read_inputs.R
read_financial_data.Rd

Read in company financial data processed from eikon exports and AR master data that contain information on multiple credit risk inputs

Usage

read_financial_data(path = NULL)

Arguments

path

A string that points to the location of the file containing the company financial data.

See also

Other import functions: read_carbon_data(), read_production_data()
